website_summaries.verdict: Take charge of the battle when you don a pair of Asics Matcontrol. This wrestling trainer features a sturdy build that helps support the wrestles as they plow through their opponents. The split-sole outsole delivers both flexibility and traction. Breathable, light, and versatile, what else could you ask for in a wrestling gear?
pros: Almost all of the reviewers are enjoying how comfortable the Asics Matcontrol feels on the feet
Many athletes are quite impressed with the durability of this wrestling shoe because it lasted more than a season of brutal usage
A lot of wearers note how quick they are on their feet because the trainer is very flexible
According to plenty of consumers, this model is very versatile and can be used for mixed martial arts, boxing, weight training, and working out, aside from wrestling
The style and various colorways of this footwear are appealing to multiple folks
cons: Some users are complaining about the outsole not being very grippy on the mat, or that it quickly loses traction after a short period of usage
Another thing irking a few owners is how easily this Asics wrestling shoe attracts dirt

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These appear to essentially be the replacement for the Cael v8.0s, maybe with some minor improvements. I originally ordered the Cael v8.0s in a 10.5US and had to return them because they were too narrow. I ordered these in an 11US (a full size larger than normal for me) and they fit comfortably snug. I got them for martial arts and they will also be good for weight training. They grip great, but still allow twisting without catching on the mat. I like the mid-high top design as they keep my heel in place and add a bit of extra ankle support. The tongue is not too bulky either. Doesn't hurt that they also look totally cool.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: To small please order one size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: To small please order one size bigger. Good quality shoe. See pictures comparation. They are both size US 11.
customer_reviews.author: Jrchino

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half size up and you've got yourself a pair of good boxing shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of boxing shoes so I was very worried about the fit according to the many reviews I read about on the sizing. Most of them recommended getting a full size up, but I went with my gut feeling and just got a half size up. I usually wear a size 9 1/2 for most regular shoes, so I went with a size 10 for this boxing shoe. Fit was perfect. Of course, boxing shoes will always have that snug/tight feel, but the pair I got had just the right amount of tightness. Overall, I am satisfied with this purchase! I will buy this again in the future when the one I have wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They arenused for parkour and wall trampoline. They are working great and the toe box is withstanding the beating. Great shoes. And they stretch after wearing with the narrowness not being an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota loved

customer_reviews.title: Wrestle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them fit good I just went a half size up. Bease most reviews sounds like they ran small
customer_reviews.author: kelly hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brothers upcoming season. You can never go wrong when going with asics wrestling shoes. These are great shoes for beginners and advance wrestlers and they fit true to size would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!
customer_reviews.text: Read the review so I decided to size up- glad I did beacuse they are a bit tight and smaller. Otherwise, a great shoe- my boyfriend loves to wear it during leg training days in the gym because of its flat sole.

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any grip on the mat
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old wrestler is not impressed. There’s not much grip on the mat with these but these will be ok for practice. Wouldn’t recommend for the seasoned wrestler.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer ”Harvesting Life’s Lessons”

customer_reviews.title: Not alot of grip
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars only because of the quality of the shoe. Grip on the mat was less than desired by my son we will be sticking with aggressors

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen boys. They liked them and the fit was as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Looked sharp. Comfortable. Held up all season.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes. They held up the whole season with no issues at all. Comfortable. Great color, matched his singlet perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great traction, fit is perfect, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for pre-season practice. Great mat grip, great fit, could not be happier!

customer_reviews.title: epic go half size up
customer_reviews.text: love asics wrestling shoes very comfortable, breathable, flexible and so far grippy. u gotta go half a size up tho but other than that they are clean and are at a good price

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son and he loves them. Fit perfect and feel good he said.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son - excellent fit and great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son - excellent fit and great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Take advantage to return time
customer_reviews.text: I hated that it did not come half sizes above size 11. I take a size 12 and it was tight. Going to a whole size bigger was not a good fit for me.

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend love them
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my boyfriend anf he loves them. I did got a bigger size and I'm glad i did. Go one size up!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a wide foot and these it well.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe; in the correct size that fits
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style, the material and the fit, once you get the correct size that fit. What I dislike was, the shoe fit smaller than the size. I had to return and reorder a different size.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: wrong size chart. I ordered European 44.5 and according to the table it was 10.5 US. But on the shoe itself it is written that 10.5 corresponds to 43.5. Sending back is expensive (half the cost of the shoe). It is impossible to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Berenshtein

customer_reviews.title: Great traction on the mat!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit and support. Provides great traction while on the mat.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes might want to order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Son wears a size 8 in shoes but had to send back and order size 9 instead

customer_reviews.title: good

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit true to other Asics that my son wears..good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the flex soles by Asics..that's just a personal preference..great shoe for the price shipping was spot on

customer_reviews.title: the sneakers are very cool and comfortable I advise, my son is very comfortable fighting in them.

customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable and look great with my singlet but they get dirty way to fast

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great style, light weight, and great ankle support

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Great price.

product_meta.title: ASICS - Mens Matcontrol Shoes
product_meta.description: Get ready to face any opponent in comfort and style with the unisex MATCONTROL wrestling shoe by ASICS. Engineered with specialised foot and ankle support plus excellent grip on the sole, this shoe will help you put in an elite performance in the ring. Weight: 8.32.
feature_bullets: Split sole design for flexibility and traction
Ankle padding provides comfort and support
OrthoLite Impressions sockliner provides responsive cushioning for comfort
Lace Garage Technology provides a pocket enabling the laces to be tucked in and unexposed
